title: 303: Met Gala Breakdown: Loves & Hates!
itunes:title: 303: Met Gala Breakdown: Loves & Hates!
description:
(TIP: This is one you may want to watch on Chatty Broads Youtube channel!) It’s fashion time, broads, and Bekah and Jess are joined by Bekah’s sister Rachel Martinez to breakdown the fashion do’s and don’ts of the 2021 Met Gala! They discuss the theme, what the Met Gala is supposed to be, and then dive into their personal favorites and least favorites of the night! They love some unpopular looks, can’t stand some crowd favorites, have differing opinions and all around have a wonderful time giving their hot takes via The Chatty Broads Fashion Haus!

 

CHATTY BROADS YOUTUBE CHANNEL HERE: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ

**All photos used on Youtube are Getty Images 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***ROTHY’S: get $20 off your first purchase at ROTHYS.COM/CHATTY

***MEUNDIES: get 15% off your first order and free shipping at MEUNDIES.COM/CHATTY

***FABLE HOME: go to FABLEHOME.CO and use code CHATTY for 10% off your first purchase!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
